content:
I use mk-exercise in lean-by-example to generate exercise files.

But different repositories have different execution times for lake exe mk_exercise.

In mk-exercise repository:

mk-exercise on  main
❯ lake test
performance test 274ms

In lean-by-example repository:

lean-by-example on  main [$] took 2s
❯ lake run build
Running mk_exercise: 585ms
Running mdgen: 613ms
Running mdbook: 535ms
Total time: 1734ms

Why are the execution times so different when it is the same command and what it is doing?
(note: performance test in mk-exercise is the same job in lean-by-example)
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
